SELECT
FROM rank_table WHERE mem_id = #{memId} AND game_name = #{gameName}

SELECT rownum rno, a.* FROM (SELECT rank_score, member_table.mem_nick, game_name FROM rank_table, member_table WHERE member_table.mem_id = rank_table.mem_id and game_name = #{gameName} ORDER BY rank_score desc)a WHERE rownum <=5

SELECT rownum rno, a.* FROM (SELECT rank_score, member_table.mem_nick, game_name from rank_table, member_table WHERE member_table.mem_id = rank_table.mem_id and game_name = #{gameName} ORDER BY rank_score desc)a WHERE rownum between 1 and 5

select a.* from (select a.rank_score, b.mem_nick, a.game_name, rank() over (order by rank_score desc) as rank from rank_table a, member_table b where a.mem_id = b.mem_id and a.game_name = #{gameName1}) a, (select * from (select rank_score, mem_id, game_name ,rank() over (order by rank_score desc) as rank from rank_table) where mem_id = #{memId} and game_name = #{gameName2}) b where a.rank between b.rank-2 and b.rank+2
